Class Ship

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Polygon
      • Ship
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.Shape, java.io.Serializable

    public class Ship
extends java.awt.Polygon
    Contains all of the properties for the ship, extending the Polygon class.
    Since:
    9/20/2018
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • increaseSittingAngle

        public void increaseSittingAngle()
        Increases the angle the ship is facing while still by 5 degrees, but keeps it within 360 degrees.

        public void decreaseSittingAngle()
        Decreases the angle the ship is facing while still by 5 degrees, but keeps it within 360 degrees.

      • setBounds

        public java.awt.Rectangle setBounds()
        Sets rectangle around the ship to manage its collision with rocks.
        Returns:
        Rectangle

      • getShipTipX

        public double getShipTipX()
        Gets the x-coordinate for the ships tip. Formula written out: x + cos(angle) * length of line
        Returns:
        ShipTipX

      • getShipTipY

        public double getShipTipY()
        Gets the y-coordinate for the ships tip. Formula written out: x + sin(angle) * length of line
        Returns:
        ShipTipY

      • move

        public void move()
        Allows the ship to move around the screen. Positions the ship on the opposite of the board if it goes over the edge.
